title: Sci Fi Guitars Bundle
description: WAS $29.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! Sci Fi Guitars Bundle is a multi pack discounted bundle asset pack which includes the very best of both Sci Fi Guitars 1 & 2 for the great price of ONLY
longDescription:
SCI-FI Guitars bundle brings you 20 of our best guitar music assets all in one place for only $29.99. You will get 74 minutes worth of music & music assets crafted by a professional music producer. All music comes as 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit available on all platforms & compatible with the most up to date version of Unreal Engine. If you want heavy industrial & Sci Fi soundscapes then look no further! Cerberus Audio offers you this bundle for the lifetime fixed price of $29.00.

🎮

LISTEN TO SCI-FI Guitars (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-preview/s-3AD8rw0dcR7


LISTEN TO SCI-FI Guitars 2 (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-2-preview/s-R9KAObnpgws

🎮

PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files/CUES. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.
